summary: Replaces the sound effect that plays when the game notifies you that you are ready to level up
descriptionHtml:
The sound effect that plays when you level up is very loud and obnoxious to me so I wanted to go for something more \"roleplay gentle\" and feels like a level up notification from past Elder Scrolls games. 

It basically replaces the following sound in the link below
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J_UUbG_N4gE

WITH THIS: What plays at 2:28 to 2:38 in the link below
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PjqsYzBrP-M

So ONLY those ten seconds of music [2:28 to 2:38] that play in the second link is the replacement sound except I used Audacity to create a fade in / fade out sound on it to give it a stand alone feel.

I created this for myself and thought I would share it with others who might like it as well. 


Installation
==========

1) Extract the .rar file
2) Copy the data folder
3) Navigate to your main Skyrim folder and paste it there. Merge with existing data folder.



Other Sound Changing mods by myself and others
==========================================

author: Oomo
